title: Immortal, The invisible war
description:
The two sourcebooks for the IMMORTAL: INVISIBLE WAR pen and paper rpg.  If you've found this thread and have never heard of it before, do yourself a favor and check it out.  I'll admit that the game isn't for everyone, being story and role play based rather than Hack and Slash (You could play hack and slash, but honestly the system isn't really set up for it.  

Contained are:
Players Guide
Narrators Guide
Basic Character Sheet
Expanded Character Sheet
Errata for both of the above (MS Word file)
Character Creation steps (Seperate reference of mine so i didn't have to keep 
                         jumping around in the book)


Please note that the Players Guide and Narrators Guide are copyright to the games creators and have been made available by the creators as free online downloads.  If you are looking for more information on the game or for direct downloads, check out the site at http://www.invisiblewar.com/main.html

Enjoy :)
